title: Emerald & Diamond Floral Cascade Haaram - A Timeless Treasure
materials: 22K Gold (గుణముల బంగారం) setting with meticulously set Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones and genuine Emeralds (పచ్చలు). Lustrous freshwater Pearls. Features a signature Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced brilliance.
features: A stunning floral-inspired design with intricate filigree work reminiscent of traditional Nakshi craftsmanship. The necklace features a graceful cascade of Emerald and CZ studded pendants, interspersed with delicate pearl drops. The central Emerald, a captivating teardrop cut, serves as the focal point, framed by a halo of shimmering CZs. Modern elements blended seamlessly with traditional South Indian jewelry aesthetics.
colors: with the vibrant green of the Emeralds providing a striking contrast against the brilliance of the CZs and the soft ivory of the Pearls. A harmonious blend of auspicious colors.
occasions: and special occasions like Seemantham (శీమంతం) and Half-Saree functions. Also suitable for adding a touch of elegance to contemporary formal events and celebrations. Ideal for Muhurtham (ముహూర్తం) ceremonies.
description: A unique blend of traditional design and modern sensibilities. Handcrafted with meticulous attention to detail by skilled artisans in Hyderabad. The high-quality CZ stones provide exceptional sparkle, mirroring the brilliance of diamonds at an accessible price point. The genuine Emeralds add a touch of luxury and sophistication. Durable and timeless, this Haaram is an investment piece that can be treasured for generations. Symbolizes prosperity and good fortune, making it a meaningful gift.
